msg: Return a 400 rather than a 200 if headers are too large

author: dennisl
msg: Prevent loosing the license header during the release process. This is a known issue. See section B.7 at http://wiki.apache.org/commons/CreatingReleases for the workaround used here.

msg: Enhanced table to invoke controlLink onInit and onRender events. Removed controlLink ID rendering
